description: Proposed change of use of the single-story outbuilding from being used as ancillary office use in conjunction with the principle operational use as a School/Seminary (D1 Class Use), to use as a library and IT room; installation of two air conditioning condenser units on roof (retrospective element)
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of an inappropriate use of the outbuilding and its location in the rear garden, would give rise to unacceptable levels of noise, disturbance and overlooking, to the detriment of the residential amenities of neighbouring occupiers. As such the proposal is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering good design) and D14 (Noise) of the London Plan 2021 and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020.
